name: Alice's 🌈Gay🌈 Baking Adventure
description:
Alice gets into a quest to show her appreciation (and more) for Marisa!

Action game made using characters from Touhou project with VN segments.  It is an early prototype!


CREDITS
  • Development, Gameplay Design: Joshlynn
  • Music: InSuccession
  • 2D art, portraits and backgrounds: dennisty
  • Writing, 3D art: dosei
